Html:
All,

As you've probably read in the other Discussion down the page, Kavan sent me instructions for creating Rawr builds, and I will be assuming that responsibility forthwith. I can't give you an immediate schedule for exactly when the next build will be out the door, but I would like it to be Soon (tm). Unfortunately, this means that it will probably ignore the latest new items, but my priority right now is to fight the immediate fires - unable to load characters, errors when optimizing, item sets, and other show-stopping bugs. I would beg your patience as I get set into this role and try to wrangle things back on track; I am, after all, only a volunteer, and my time to work on Rawr is limited at best.
